select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from rw_recharge
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: select * from rw_recharge where trans_code = #{code} and enabled = '1' and status = '0' group by trans_serial,plat_no

SELECT * FROM eacc_accountamtlist e LEFT JOIN rw_recharge r ON e.trans_serial = r.trans_serial WHERE r.trans_code IN ( 'C00001', 'C00002', 'C00003', 'C00011', 'CK0001', 'C00005' ) AND DATE_FORMAT(e.account_date, '%Y%m%d') = #{clear_date} AND ( r.self_bank_flag != '0' OR r.self_bank_flag IS NULL ) AND r.plat_no = #{plat_no} AND r.pay_code = #{pay_code} AND r.status = #{status}
mapper.update:
update rw_recharge
host_req_serial_no = #{host_req_serial_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirm_time = #{confirm_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_time = #{last_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
return_code = #{return_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
return_msg = #{return_msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notify_msg = #{notify_msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{update_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext3 = #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext4 = #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext5 = #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hsepay_order_no = #{hsepay_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
self_bank_flag = #{self_bank_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where trans_serial = #{trans_serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status <> "1"
